altodextrin, saccharide isomerate, sodium citrate, caprylhydroxamic acid, magnesium pca, zinc pca, lactic acid, manganese pca, sodium chloride, phenylpropanol, levulinic acid, sodium levulinate

Warnings: : External use. Keep out of the reach of children and away from sunlight, in a dry and ventilated place. Do not use it on irritated or injured sk
book: 0495-Noorskin Light Velvet Revitalizing Facial Cleansing Foam

chunk: itated or injured skin. In case of contact with eyes, wash them with running water. In case of irritation, discontinue use and consult a doctor. This product has been formulated to minimize possible allergies.
